message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40%.
I think 55-45 is more than fair, considering the inflation hits you harder.
The inflation is hurting us both, Bob. Let's settle this now. 55-45 is my final offer.
You said 55-45 was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Inflation is on my side.
Okay Bob, you win. It's clear you're willing to play this game longer.  Let's settle for your 55-45 split before we both lose even more to inflation.
